Name: Description
Description: A description of the general instruction. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: CommandCode
Description: Structured information used by a system to process the instruction.

Name: OverriddenCodeReference
Description: Used when attribute of the containing GeneralInstruction isOverride equals true. This element provides the reference to the GeneralInstruction being overridden by the use of this instruction. For example a special confidentiality process used for a select set of variables rather than the normal process.

Name: IsOverride
Description: If set to "true", indicates that this coding instruction overrides a more generally used process.
